attributes.action: avoid discussing the sovereignty of the Falkland Islands with President Cristina Kirchner of Argentina
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is press speculation that Gordon Brown will discuss the sovereignty of the Falkland Islands when he meets Cristina Kirchner in Chile this week. 

Please support this petition in memory of the Armed Forces who lost their lives  liberating the Islands after the Argentinian invasion in 1982 and in support of the Islanders who wish to remain British.
